title: U.S. Seeks Closer Ties With India as Tension With China and Russia Builds
description: Treasury Secretary Yellen wants India to be part of the Biden administration’s “friend-shoring” agenda, but trade tensions linger.
dc:creator: Alan Rappeport and Ana Swanson
media:description: Treasury Secretary Janet L. Yellen was welcomed by Anant Maheshwari of Microsoft at the Microsoft India Development Center in Noida, on the outskirts of New Delhi, on Friday.
